Text: PLEASE upload the most recent episodes! Love this series.
Thanks to the uploader for previous episodes and as the last message can you please upload later ones as they are nowhere else to be found. Great fun to watch series...
Please, Please, Please upload episode 6 and 7, cannot find these anywhere which is just evil.
This opens as a Rar file and I cannot watch it.  Can anyone explain how to convert this to be able to watch?  Please

myplus, you have to use a program like winrar that unzips all the rar files into one playable mkv file. you cant play a rar file. Google how to unzip rar files so you know what to do. Its not hard once you have done it once
